item.title: async.parallel with a simple timeout (node.js)
item.description: A while back I had a need for a general timeout option for async.parallel and was surprised I couldn’t find much information about how to do it. I was using async.parallel to make a lot of REST calls in parallel, but one of them was getting blocked by a firewall, resulting in an eventual timeout minutes later. One option was to specify a shorter timeout for each individual REST call, including the one causing the problem.
